Package StratmasClient.map

Class Summary
AreaCreationDrawer This class is used for creating new area for military units, teams, agencies and activities.
AzEqAreaProj Azimuthal Equal Area Projection is implemented in this class.
BasicMap Basic STRATMAS map controller.
BasicMapDrawer The base class for the map.
ColorMap Color map scale used for visualizing of STRATMAS simulator results on the map.
ColorMapDialog ColorMapDialog is used to set options for the color map.
DisplayControl This class implements variety of panels used to control display of stratmas elements and other objects on the map.
DraggableJButton This class enables drag action in DnD.
DraggableJMenuItem This class enables drag action in DnD.
DraggedElement This class is used for the dragged object in Drag'n'drop action.
GeoMath This class contains necessary measures and methods used in STRATMAS map manipulations.
GLScreenShotHandler Specialized class for jogl screeenshots.
GraticuleLayer The graticules which cover a region inside a bounding box are created.
GridLayer This class implements the grid of cells over a region defined by Shape objects.
MapConstants This class contains several constants used in this package.
MapDrawableComparator MapDrawableComparator is used to compare adapters drawn in the map.
MapDrawer All currently visible elements in the main map are drawed in this class.
MapDrawerDebugFrame Debug frame for the MapDrawer class
MapLine Represents a ordinary (straight) line.
MapPoint Represents a point for use in the map.
PositionMap Position/navigation window.
ProcessVariableTable This is implementation of a table of values for all process variables and all factions over an arbitrary region.
ProcessVariableTableModel The table model for the table of process variables and factions.
ProcessVariableTablePanel This is implementation of a table of values for all process variables and all factions over an arbitrary region.
Projection This is a parent class of all projection classes.
PVPanel This panel contains two JComboBox lists: the process variables and the factions for the actual simulation.
Region Region defined by Shape objects.
RenderSelection Encapsulates the information in an render selection buffer.
ScreenShotHandler Class to handle screen-shots.
StratMap STRATMAS map controller.
SymbolToTextureMapper A texture cache implementation
Visualizer This class containes all the maps as well as the control windows for controlling these maps.
ZoomAndScale Zomming and scaling functionalities.
